title: RRB Group D Recruitment 2026
description:
Railway Recruitment Board (RRB) will conduct Group D (Level-1) recruitment for various posts such as Track Maintainer, Helper, Assistant Pointsman and other technical/non-technical posts across Indian Railways.

ELIGIBILITY:
• 10th Pass OR ITI from recognized board
• Age limit as per RRB rules

SELECTION PROCESS:
• Computer Based Test (CBT)
• Physical Efficiency Test (PET)
• Document Verification
• Medical Examination

IMPORTANT NOTE:
Candidates are advised to read the official notification carefully before applying. Selection will be strictly based on RRB norms.

title: RBI Office Assistant Recruitment 2026
description:
Reserve Bank of India (RBI) has released the Office Assistant recruitment notification for various regional offices.

ELIGIBILITY:
• 10th or 12th pass candidates
• Local language knowledge preferred

SELECTION PROCESS:
• Written Examination
• Language Proficiency Test (LPT)

IMPORTANT NOTE:
Candidates must apply online through the official RBI website only.

title: PSSSB Group D Recruitment 2026
description:
Punjab Subordinate Services Selection Board (PSSSB) has released Group D recruitment notification for various departments of Punjab Government.

ELIGIBILITY:
• 10th pass with Punjabi subject

SELECTION PROCESS:
• Written Examination
• Document Verification

IMPORTANT NOTE:
Candidates must check category-wise reservation details in official notification.

title: PSSSB Clerk Recruitment 2026
description:
Punjab Subordinate Services Selection Board (PSSSB) has released Clerk and Clerk (IT) recruitment notification for Group-C posts.

ELIGIBILITY:
• Graduation from recognized university
• Computer certificate or computer subject in qualification

SELECTION PROCESS:
• Written Examination
• Typing Test
• Document Verification

title: Indian Air Force Agniveer Vayu Intake 01/2027 Recruitment
description:
Indian Air Force has released Agniveer Vayu Intake 01/2027 recruitment under the Agnipath Scheme.

ELIGIBILITY:
• Unmarried male & female candidates
• 10+2 Science with Physics & Mathematics OR Diploma OR Vocational Course

SELECTION PROCESS:
• Online Written Exam
• Physical Fitness Test (PFT)
• Adaptability Test
• Medical Examination

SERVICE DETAILS:
• Service period: 4 Years
• Salary & benefits as per Agnipath Scheme

title: CTET Admit Card 2026 Released
description:
CBSE has released CTET 2026 Admit Card. Candidates can download their admit card using application number and date of birth.

IMPORTANT:
• Admit card is mandatory for exam entry
• Carry valid photo ID along with admit card

title: PSSSB Group D Admit Card 2025
description: PSSSB has released Group D examination admit card. Candidates can download it from the official website.

title: Punjab Police Constable Result 2025
description: Punjab Police has declared Constable examination result. Candidates can check their result online using roll number.
